snippet: Storms cleared ahead of the Preakness Stakes, and California Chrome’s trainers said that he was ready and that worries over a scratchy throat were overblown.
abstract: Trainers for California Chrome say horse is in good health and that worries about a scratchy throat were overblown; stormy weather that had worried some ahead of Preakness Stakes has cleared, with track expected to be in fine condition for race.
lead_paragraph: Storms cleared ahead of the Preakness Stakes, and California Chrome’s trainers said that he was ready and that worries over a scratchy throat were overblown.

headline.main: Concerns Fade Over Weather and the Favorite’s Health
headline.print_headline: Storms Fade; So Do Worries Over Health of Favorite
